Please ensure that you are wearing your headphones or earphones if you are not already doing so.

Use the slider below to set the volume for all the sounds that will be played during the tasks.

Please be careful to not set it to a level that is too high.

Start with a very low value, press the Play button, and then adjust the slider. The sound will play in a loop, and you can press the button to toggle between playing and paused.

The volume should be set so that the sound that is played is loud but not uncomfortable.
